scripts.sandbox: curl -fsSL https://deno.land/x/install/install.sh | sh && export DENO_INSTALL="~/.local" &&  export PATH="$DENO_INSTALL/bin:$PATH" && pnpm run build && deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-env ./dist/server/entry.mjs
scripts.deno-gitpod: curl -fsSL https://deno.land/x/install/install.sh | sh && export DENO_INSTALL='/home/gitpod/.deno' &&  export PATH='$DENO_INSTALL/bin:$PATH'
